Text:
Expanding to 70 prisons in the next 3 years,@TheClinkCharity's catering training scheme will help offenders gain@CityandGuildsqualifications so they can find employment on release, which will in turn reduce reoffending by almost 32%. 

Find out more:https://gov.uk/government/news/crime-cutting-prison-scheme-expanded…
We won!! So proud to be a part of this team@cityandguildsEPAO Organisation of the Year at the FAB awards#fabawards#epaooftheyear
Happy days in class today with thumbs up from Siân and Maya with carving a smoked salmon… @colegcambria@HafodCambria@Hudson1Judith@andywoods215@cityandguilds#skills#foodandbeverage
We interviewed@AnnLimb, Chair of@cityandguildsabout the last session of#AoCConf21Listen below to hear her opinionIn conjunction with@NCFEhttp://fenews.co.uk

END POINT ASSESSMENT ORGANISATION OF THE YEARSponsored by @RM_Results 

Congratulations@cityandguilds#FABawards2021

Another drop off to a local@Sue_Ryderfrom our bicycle workshop where pre-owned bikes are given a new lease of life. The YA’s are able to be a part of giving back to the community at the same time as gaining@cityandguildsaccreditation#powerofeducation#rehabculture#community

How proud I was to be at the#FAB2021awards tonight and hear the announcement that@cityandguildswon the award for the best EPA Organisation.What an achievement for a team that has worked so hard and tirelessly through a year like no other!#superproudCEO

This week on the#EssentialSkillsSeriesour very own@Essential_Garyshows how to make dauphinoise potatoesEmail advice@essentialcuisine.com to gain access to our growing bank of video demonstrations! Many thanks to our partners@cityandguilds,@PACEUK.#nextgenerate#skills
Our nail students have been busy creating this beautiful Remembrance Day display!#remembranceday#nails#nailart#remember#nailtech#poppy@CheshireCollSW@cityandguilds@CGHairBeauty

Last week, we ran our@cityandguilds#NPTCTree Climbing & Aerial Rescue course. One of the candidates was from@ArborfieldTree& they gave the team some wonderful feedback, stating ''I was very happy with the course content and delivery of information. Thanks to all staff''

Congratulations to@cityandguildscentre@STCG_College, on being awarded with the Eric Hill Memorial Award by The Worshipful Company of Environmental Cleaners, in recognition of your ‘Practical Cleaning Skills’ course exam success rate.#MySkillsStoryhttp://ow.ly/a5Fl50GRIzX

Weworking with so many teachers and youth workers! 

Our FREE training gives delegates the knowledge, skills and confidence to deliver sessions directly to young people. Delegates receive a formal@cityandguildscertification on completion and access to over 450 resources.
We have something exciting to tell you about in the new year for all of our@cityandguilds#Hairdressinglearners.@leestaffordhair@LeeStaffordLSE#Hair

Best of luck to Eric Bristow,  who after 38 years is leaving the Royal Marines to work as a gas engineer, after undertaking a number@cityandguildscourses.#MySkillsStory@questmagazinehttp://ow.ly/8w0z50He3ui
